jokes.Joke: On the other hand, you have different fingers.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I'm afraid of widths.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: At one point he decided enough was enough.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Cross country skiing is great if you live in a small country.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Babies don't need a vacation, but I still see them at the beach... it pisses me off! I'll go over to a little baby and say 'What are you doing here? You haven't worked a day in your life!'
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I was once walking through the forest alone. A tree fell right in front of me, and I didn't hear a thing.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I have a large seashell collection which I keep scattered on the beaches all over the world. Maybe you've seen it.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: When I first read the dictionary, I thought it was a long poem about everything.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: They say you're not supposed to put metal in a microwave oven. They're right.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I have a paper cut from writing my suicide note. It's a start...
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Do Lipton employees take coffee breaks?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Do you think that when they asked George Washington for ID that he just whipped out a quarter?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: How young can you die of old age?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I bought some powder water one time but I didn't know what to add to it.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I busted a mirror and got seven years bad luck, but my lawyer thinks he can get me five.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I had some eyeglasses. I was walking down the street when suddenly the prescription ran out.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I installed a skylight in my apartment... the people who live above me are furious!
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I like to reminisce with people I don't know.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I remember when the candle shop burned down. Everyone stood around singing 'Happy Birthday.'
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I stayed in a really old hotel last night. They sent me a wake-up letter.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I think God's going to come down and pull civilization over for speeding.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I think it's wrong that only one company makes the game Monopoly.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I went down the street to the 24-hour grocery. When I got there, the guy was locking the front door. I said, 'Hey, the sign says you're open 24 hours.' He said, 'Yes, but not in a row.'
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I went to a general store but they wouldn't let me buy anything specific.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I went to a restaurant that serves `breakfast at any time`. So I ordered French Toast during the Renaissance.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I wrote a few children's books... not on purpose.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I'm writing an unauthorized autobiography.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: If a word in the dictionary were misspelled, how would we know?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: If one synchronised swimmer drowns, do all the rest have to drown too?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: If you can't hear me, it's because I'm in parentheses.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: If you had a million Shakespeares, could they write like a monkey?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: In Vegas, I got into a long argument with the man at the roulette wheel over what I considered to be an odd number.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: It doesn't make a difference what temperature a room is, it's always room temperature.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: It's a small world, but I wouldn't want to have to paint it.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Last night I stayed up late playing poker with Tarot cards. I got a full house and four people died.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Last year I went fishing with Salvador Dali. He was using a dotted line. He caught every other fish.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: My friend has a baby. I'm recording all the noises he makes so later I can ask him what he meant.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Sponges grow in the ocean. That just kills me. I wonder how much deeper the ocean would be if that didn't happen.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: The other day I... uh, no, that wasn't me.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: What a nice night for an evening.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: When I was a little kid we had a sand box. It was a quicksand box. I was an only child... eventually.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: When I was crossing the border into Canada, they asked if I had any firearms with me. I said, `Well, what do you need?`
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: You can't have everything. Where would you put it?
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I got a dog and named him 'Stay'. Now, I go 'Come here, Stay!' After a while, the dog went insane and wouldn't move at all.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: In my house there's this light switch that doesn't do anything. Every so often I would flick it on and off just to check. Yesterday, I got a call from a woman in Germany. She said, `Cut it out.`
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: When I turned two I was really anxious, because I'd doubled my age in a year. I thought, if this keeps up, by the time I'm six I'll be ninety.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: I wrote a song, but I can't read music so I don't know what it is. Every once in a while I'll be listening to the radio and I say, `I think I might have written that.`
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: My girlfriend asked me how long I was going to be gone on this tour. I said, `the whole time`.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: Some friends of mine got me a sweater for my birthday. I'd have preferred a moaner or a screamer, but the sweater was OK.
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright

jokes.Joke: When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me, `Did you sleep good?` I said `No, I made a few mistakes.`
jokes.Creator: Steven Wright
